PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-14532013-12-17,  ,  CH,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of GLEN SCHMIDT of Calgary, Alberta, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Ian McIlreath.
AttachmentsAttachment
